lead_paragraph: WHITMAN--Edward I.,91 years young, died February 10, 2016. Loving husband, father to Howard and Richard, and daughters-in-law Joan and Hope and grandfather to Harrison, Ilana and Ashley, uncle and great- uncle. He was a force of nature and lived by his own standards and rules, and was a loyal friend to many. Predeceased by his parents Philip and Julia Whitman and by the love of his life, Helen Whitman on January 15, 2016 after 69 years of marriage. Graveside services will take place on Sunday, February 14, 2016 at 12:30pm at Mt. Ararat Cemetery in Farmingdale, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WHITMAN, EDWARD I.
